articles.author: The Hill
articles.title: Live updates: Trump addresses House Republicans; Senate confirms Treasury secretary
articles.description: President Trump's second week back in office kicks off with military-focused executive orders and a visit to the House GOP Florida retreat while Senate confirmations progress. Follow for live updates.
articles.content:
Monday kicked off the second week of President Trump’s return to the White House, and it’s was a busy one.

articles.title: First lady Melania Trump poses in black and white official White House portrait
articles.description: The White House released the official portrait of first lady Melania Trump on Monday.
articles.content:
The White House unveiled its official portrait of first lady Melania Trump on Monday.
Mrs. Trump is pictured in a suit, standing in front of a window with the Washington Monument in the rearview, and the photo is in black and white.

articles.author: Chicago Tribune
articles.title: Scott Bessent confirmed as treasury secretary
articles.description: The U.S. Senate confirmed billionaire investor Scott Bessent on Monday to serve as President Donald Trump’s treasury secretary, giving him the delicate balancing act of cutting taxes and curbing deficits while putting forward a plan on tariffs that doesn’t jeopardize growth.
articles.content: WASHINGTON — The U.S. Senate confirmed billionaire investor Scott Bessent on Monday to serve as President Donald Trump’s treasury secretary, giving him the delicate balancing act of cutting taxes and curbing deficits while putting forward a plan on t... [3224 chars]

articles.author: The Hill
articles.title: Trump fires all 3 Democrats on privacy oversight board
articles.description: President Trump on Monday fired all three Democrats on the Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board (PCLOB), bringing much of its work to a standstill. The move guts a board designed to ensure the government’s work to fight terrorism is balanced with protections for civil liberties. The White House informed the three Democrats on the…
articles.content:

articles.title: Trump's lesson for Colombia
articles.description: With Donald Trump in the White House and Marco Rubio in the State Department, the days of coddling our anti-American Marxist neighbors are over.
articles.content:
As the popular saying nearly goes, the president of Colombia has just futzed around and found out.

articles.author: WLTX.com
articles.title: Video doesn’t show U.S. military deployed to southern border
articles.description: A viral video claims to show U.S. troops in Texas heading to the southern border under Trump. But the video was taken in Poland and predates Trump’s second term.
articles.content:
The viral video shows Polish tanks during a military parade in the country’s capital, and it predates President Trump’s second term.
Since President Donald Trump took office on Monday, Jan. 20, his administration has issued multiple executive orders ... [2922 chars]

DORAL, Fla. — President Trump on Monday called the new Chinese AI platform DeepSeek a “wakeup call” for America — while also saying its debut could be a “positive” development if it actually works more cheaply than US competitors.

articles.title: Trump's anti-DEI executive orders target employee resource groups, federal workers say
articles.description: Federal agency workers say that professional groups meant to support employees, many of whom are from marginalized backgrounds, are under threat from President Donald Trump’s DEI executive order.
